Key Match Events: Ecuador won the match 1-0 against Chile.
Angel Mena scored the only goal for Ecuador.
Chile made offensive changes with the introduction of Felipe Loyola.
Ecuador made changes to freshen up the team and slow down the clock.
Pre-Game Insights: Full house for the match with many Ecuadorian fans present.
Neither team had any injured or suspended players.
The central referee was Anderson Daronco.
Kick-off time for the match was 19:00 hours in various countries.
